Name: Battle Imagine - Goblin Warrior
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Goblin Warrior's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Frenzied Shot.

Stunt! Frenzied Shot
Summon Elite: Goblin Warrior to shoot in a fan-shaped area in front, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Luck and Lucky Hit Chance are increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
